resources.string:
In the context of the Open eCard Project, industrial as well as academic experts have decided to work together on providing an open source and cross platform implementation of the eCard-API-Framework BSI-TR-03112, through which arbitrary applications can utilize authentication and signatures with arbitrary chip cards.

The first project artifact is the currently running Open eCard App.

Visit us at http://openecard.org, to receive further information about the project.

No software product is free of bugs and can therefore always be improved. This is also true for the Open eCard App.

Against this background, the Open eCard Team is gladly receiving bug reports and proposals and is working hard to address them in time and to provide feedback for the input.

The Open eCard Project is providing an issue tracker at http://dev.openecard.org/ for registered users in order to receive and manage the bug reports and proposals.

The Open eCard Team is an open community, encouraging all interested citizens as well as relevant institutions and organizations to participate. Anyone interested in the development of the Open eCard App, can become a member of the Open eCard Team.
